description: This is a frontend React component implemented in TypeScript with JSX, providing an admin interface for creating a new product in an e-commerce platform. It includes form handling, state management, API calls for category fetching and product creation, and navigation.

methods.name: AdminNewProduct
methods.description: Main React functional component for creating a new product in the admin UI.

methods.name: onChange
methods.description: Updates the payload state when form fields change.

methods.name: submit
methods.description: Handles form submission, calls API to create product, and redirects.
